description:
Your personal research assistant

Zotero is a free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, annotate, cite, and share research.
- [LibreOffice] Fixed footnote markers being inserted into footnotes (since 7.0.23)
  - This reverts the fix in 7.0.23 for a crash when inserting rich text on LibreOffice 25.2+, but LibreOffice 25.2.6 will be released soon with a fix
- Fixed item being related to itself after merging related items
- [Mac] Handle Windows absolute path when launching/revealing file
- [Mac] Fixed “Edit with Zotero” bubble not showing in Safari after Google Docs change
